title: CSL配置文件使披风无法显示
author: Husk93
txt_content:
{  "enable": true,  "enableSkull": true,  "enableDynamicSkull": true,  "enableTransparentSkin": false,  "ignoreHttpsCertificate": false,  "enableUpdateSkull": false,  "enableLocalProfileCache": false,  "enableCacheAutoClean": false,  "forceLoadAllTextures": true,  "cacheExpiry": 10,  "version": "14.12",  "loadlist": [    {      "type": "Legacy",      "skin": "LocalSkin/skins/{USERNAME}.png",      "cape": "LocalSkin/capes/{USERNAME}.png",      "elytra": "LocalSkin/elytras/{USERNAME}.png"    },    {      "type": "CustomSkinAPI"    },    {      "type": "UniSkinAPI"    },    {      "type": "MojangAPI"    }  ]}复制代码
{  "enable": true,  "enableSkull": true,  "enableDynamicSkull": true,  "enableTransparentSkin": false,  "ignoreHttpsCertificate": false,  "enableUpdateSkull": false,  "enableLocalProfileCache": false,  "enableCacheAutoClean": false,  "forceLoadAllTextures": true,  "cacheExpiry": 10,  "version": "14.12",  "loadlist": [    {      "type": "Legacy",      "skin": "LocalSkin/skins/{USERNAME}.png",      "cape": "LocalSkin/capes/{USERNAME}.png",      "elytra": "LocalSkin/elytras/{USERNAME}.png"    },    {      "type": "CustomSkinAPI"    },    {      "type": "UniSkinAPI"    },    {      "type": "MojangAPI"    }  ]}
